verses.text: Ach in Diosal, colinel t'a yol sk'ab' eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin. Colinel t'a eb' scot t'ayin yuj yajk'olal.
Colinel t'a yol sk'ab' eb' sk'ulan chucal. Colinel t'a eb' mak'umcham anima.
Mamin Jehová, tzin smaclej eb' anima te ov yic tzin smak'ancham eb', palta manh yujoc in chucal, malaj tas ix vutej eb'.
Mamin, malaj in mul t'a eb'. Malaj tas chuc ix in k'ulej. Palta snanonek' sk'ol eb' yak'an chucal t'ayin. Mamin, il in coti, cotanh, tzul in a colani.
Mamin Jehová, Yajal ach t'a smasanil, co Diosal ach a onh israel onh tik, cotanh elanhchamel, tzak'anoch syaelal juntzanh nación. Mocab' ok' a k'ool t'a eb' smeltzajoch yak'an chucal t'ayin.
Ayic sq'uik'b'i sjavi eb', tz'el yav eb' icha nok' tz'i', slajvi chi' slaj ek' eb' t'a cal chonhab'.
Svoman sti' eb' tzek' eb', haxo lolonel te ya syal eb'. Malaj mach tzab'an calani, xchamlaj eb'.
Ha achxo Mamin Jehová, tzaton ach tzevaj yuj eb'. Tzach b'uchvaj t'a juntzanh nación chi'.
Ach in Diosal, a t'ayach ipan in colan in b'a, yujto a ach ay ach och vipumaloc yet' venhuloc.
Ach in Diosal, xajan in uuj, a ach ol ul in a colo'. Ol a ch'ox t'ayin tas val ol aj skan eb' vajk'ol chi' t'a yalanh uuj.
Ach Jehová co Columal, tzicub'tanhej eb' yet' a poder. Emnaquilocab' tzutejcan eb', palta manh a mak'chamlaj eb' yic a syaelal eb' chi' manh ol b'atlaj satk'olal yuj eb' vetchonhab'.
Tz'och smul eb' yuj masanil tas syala'. Canocab' eb' t'a yalanh yuj yak'umtaquil, yuj yesalvumal yet' yuj scatab'vumal eb'.
Satel eb' yet' yoval a k'ool. ¿Tasto val yuj pitzan eb'? Ach Dios Cajal a onh yinhtilonhcan vinhaj Jacob, elocab' a pecal masanto b'aj slajvik'och yol yib'anhk’inal tik.
Sjavi eb' t'ak'walil, tz'el yav eb' icha nok' tz'i', slaj ek' eb' t'a cal chonhab' say svael, tz'avaj eb' icha yok' nok' tz'i', yujto max yab'laj sk'ool svael eb'.
Ha in xo pax jun, ol ach in b'itej t'a q'uinhib'alil. Ol valel snivanil elk'ochi yet' a wach'k'olal t'a b'ital, yujto ayachnhejoch venhuloc. In Columal ach t'a stiempoal yaelal.
Ach in Diosal, ol val wach' lolonel t'ayach t'a b'ital. In Columal ach, in Diosal ach, xajanab'il in uuj.
